         <span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3APlug-in+hybrid&amp;rft.atitle=Air+quality+and+environmental+impacts+of+alternative+vehicle+technologies+in+Ontario%2C+Canada&amp;rft.au=Elkamel%2C+Ali&amp;rft.aufirst=Ivan&amp;rft.au=Fowler%2C+Michael&amp;rft.au=Hajimiragha%2C+Amirhossein&amp;rft.aulast=Kantor&amp;rft.date=2009-06-27&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.sciencedirect.com%2Fscience%2Farticle%2Fpii%2FS0360319909013639&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1016%2Fj.ijhydene.2009.08.071&amp;rft.issue=2010&amp;rft.jtitle=ScienceDirect&amp;rft.pages=5145-5153&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.volume=35">
          <span style="display:none;">
          </span>
         </span>
        </span>
       </li>
       <li id="cite_note-Searchinger08-297">
        <span class="mw-cite-backlink">
         <b>
          <a href="#cite_ref-Searchinger08_297-0">
           ^
          </a>
         </b>
        </span>
        <span class="reference-text">
         <cite class="citation journal">
          Timothy Searchinger; et al. (2008-02-29).
          <a class="external text" href="http://www.sciencemag.org/cgi/content/abstract/1151861" rel="nofollow">
           "Use of U.S. Croplands for Biofuels Increases Greenhouse Gases Through Emissions from Land-Use Change"
          </a>
          .
          <i>
           <a href="/wiki/Science_(journal)" title="Science (journal)">
            Science
           </a>
          </i>
          .
          <b>
           319
          </b>
          (5867): 1238–1240.
          <a href="/wiki/Bibcode" title="Bibcode">
           Bibcode
          </a>
          :
          <a class="external text" href="http://adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2008Sci...319.1238S" rel="nofollow">
           2008Sci...319.1238S
          </a>
          .
          <a href="/wiki/Digital_object_identifier" title="Digital object identifier">

          <a class="external text" href="//dx.doi.org/10.1126%2Fscience.1151861" rel="nofollow">

         <span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3APlug-in+hybrid&amp;rft.atitle=Use+of+U.S.+Croplands+for+Biofuels+Increases+Greenhouse+Gases+Through+Emissions+from+Land-Use+Change&amp;rft.au=Timothy+Searchinger&amp;rft.date=2008-02-29&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.sciencemag.org%2Fcgi%2Fcontent%2Fabstract%2F1151861&amp;rft_id=info%3Abibcode%2F2008Sci...319.1238S&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1126%2Fscience.1151861&amp;rft_id=info%3Apmid%2F18258860&amp;rft.issue=5867&amp;rft.jtitle=Science&amp;rft.pages=1238-1240&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.volume=319">
          <span style="display:none;">
          </span>
         </span>
         Originally published online in Science Express on 2008-02-07. See Letters to
         <i>
          Science
         </i>
         by Wang and Haq. There are critics to these findings for assuming a worst-case scenario.

          <sup>

       <li id="cite_note-308">
        <span class="mw-cite-backlink">
         <b>
          <a href="#cite_ref-308">
           ^
          </a>
         </b>
        </span>
        <span class="reference-text">
         <cite class="citation news">
          John Voelcker (2015-01-29).
          <a class="external text" href="http://www.greencarreports.com/news/1096537_2016-byd-tang-plug-in-hybrid-suv-is-first-of-four-to-come" rel="nofollow">
           "2016 BYD Tang: Plug-In Hybrid SUV Is First Of Four To Come"
          </a>
          .
          <i>
           Green Car Reports
          </i>
          <span class="reference-accessdate">
           . Retrieved
           <span class="nowrap">
            2015-02-17
           </span>
          </span>
          .
         </cite>
         <span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3APlug-in+hybrid&amp;rft.atitle=2016+BYD+Tang%3A+Plug-In+Hybrid+SUV+Is+First+Of+Four+To+Come&amp;rft.au=John+Voelcker&amp;rft.date=2015-01-29&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.greencarreports.com%2Fnews%2F1096537_2016-byd-tang-plug-in-hybrid-suv-is-first-of-four-to-come&amp;rft.jtitle=Green+Car+Reports&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal">
          <span style="display:none;">
          </span>
         </span>
         <i>
          BYD was the first company in the world to launch a production plug-in hybrid; its F3DM in 2008 was two years ahead of the 2011 Chevrolet Volt
         </i>
         .
        </span>
       </li>

          <i>

         </a>
        </span>
        <span class="reference-text">
         <cite class="citation news">
          Cobb, Jeff (2016-07-26).
          <a class="external text" href="http://www.hybridcars.com/top-selling-chevy-volt-crosses-100000-us-sales-milestone/" rel="nofollow">
           "Top-Selling Chevy Volt Crosses 100,000 US Sales Milestone"
          </a>
          .

           HybridCars.com
          </i>
          <span class="reference-accessdate">

         <span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3APlug-in+hybrid&amp;rft.atitle=Top-Selling+Chevy+Volt+Crosses+100%2C000+US+Sales+Milestone&amp;rft.aufirst=Jeff&amp;rft.aulast=Cobb&amp;rft.date=2016-07-26&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.hybridcars.com%2Ftop-selling-chevy-volt-crosses-100000-us-sales-milestone%2F&amp;rft.jtitle=HybridCars.com&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal">
          <span style="display:none;">
          </span>
         </span>
         <i>
          As of June 2016
          <sup class="plainlinks noprint asof-tag update" style="display:none;">
           <a class="external text" href="//en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Plug-in_hybrid&amp;action=edit">
            [update]
           </a>
          </sup>
          , around 117,000 units of the Volt/Ampera family have been sold globally, including close to 10,000 Opel/Vauxhall Ampera variants sold in Europe. Volt sales in the American market passed the 100,000 milestone in July 2016.
         </i>
        </span>
       </li>
       <li id="cite_note-Top10Global062016-329">
        <span class="mw-cite-backlink">
         ^
         <a href="#cite_ref-Top10Global062016_329-0">
          <sup>
           <i>

            </b>
           </i>
          </sup>
         </a>
        </span>
        <span class="reference-text">
         <cite class="citation news">
          Cobb, Jeff (2016-08-10).
          <a class="external text" href="http://www.hybridcars.com/global-10-best-selling-plug-in-cars-are-accelerating-forward/" rel="nofollow">

          </a>

          </i>
          <span class="reference-accessdate">

         <span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3APlug-in+hybrid&amp;rft.atitle=Global+10+Best-Selling+Plug-In+Cars+Are+Accelerating+Forward&amp;rft.aufirst=Jeff&amp;rft.aulast=Cobb&amp;rft.date=2016-08-10&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.hybridcars.com%2Fglobal-10-best-selling-plug-in-cars-are-accelerating-forward%2F&amp;rft.jtitle=HybridCars.com&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal">
          <span style="display:none;">
          </span>
         </span>
         <i>
          As of June 2016
          <sup class="plainlinks noprint asof-tag update" style="display:none;">
           <a class="external text" href="//en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Plug-in_hybrid&amp;action=edit">
            [update]
           </a>
          </sup>
          , cumulative global sales of the top selling plug-in electric cars were led by the Nissan Leaf (over 228,000), followed by theTesla Model S (129,393), Votl/Ampera family (about 117,300), Mitsubishi Outlander PHEV (about 107,400), Toyota Prius PHV (over 75,400), BYD Qin (56,191), Renault Zoe (51,193), BMW i3 (around 49,500), Mitsubishi i-MiEV family (about 37,600) and BYD Tang (37,509).
         </i>
        </span>
       </li>

         <span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3APlug-in+hybrid&amp;rft.au=Kraftfahrt-Bundesamt+%28KBA%29&amp;rft.btitle=Neuzulassungen+von+Personenkraftwagen+nach+Segmenten+und+Modellreihen+im+Dezember+2015&amp;rft.date=2016-01&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.kba.de%2FDE%2FPresse%2FPresseportal%2FN_Segmente_Modellreihen_FZ11%2FN_Segmente2015%2Fn_seg_12_15_pdf.pdf%3F__blob%3DpublicationFile%26v%3D3&amp;rft.pub=KBA&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook">
          <span style="display:none;">
          </span>
         </span>
         <i>
          21 Amperas and zero Volts were registered in Germany in 2015.
         </i>
        </span>
       </li>
       <li id="cite_note-UK3Q2015-339">
        <span class="mw-cite-backlink">
         <b>
          <a href="#cite_ref-UK3Q2015_339-0">
           ^
          </a>
         </b>
        </span>
        <span class="reference-text">
         <cite class="citation web">
          RAC Foundation.
          <a class="external text" href="http://www.racfoundation.org/data/plug-in-grant-eligible-vehicles-licensed-by-quarter" rel="nofollow">
           "Plug-in grant eligible vehicles licensed"
          </a>
          . UK:
          <a href="/wiki/RAC_Foundation" title="RAC Foundation">
           RAC Foundation
          </a>
          <span class="reference-accessdate">
           . Retrieved
           <span class="nowrap">
            2016-01-22
           </span>
          </span>
          .
         </cite>
         <span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3APlug-in+hybrid&amp;rft.au=RAC+Foundation&amp;rft.btitle=Plug-in+grant+eligible+vehicles+licensed&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.racfoundation.org%2Fdata%2Fplug-in-grant-eligible-vehicles-licensed-by-quarter&amp;rft.place=UK&amp;rft.pub=RAC+Foundation&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook">
          <span style="display:none;">
          </span>
         </span>
         <i>
          Figures correspond to the number of vehicles registered at the end of the corresponding month. A total of 1,279 Amperas were registered in the UK at the end of September 2015, and 125 Volts at the end of June 2015. The number of registered Volts decreased by September 2015.
         </i>
        </span>
       </li>

         <span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3APlug-in+hybrid&amp;rft.au=Bil+Sweden&amp;rft.btitle=Nyregistreringar+december+2014+%28prel%29&amp;rft.date=2015-01-02&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.bilsweden.se%2Fstatistik%2Farkiv-nyregistrering_per_manad_2014%2Fnyregistreringar-december-2014-%28prel%29&amp;rft.pub=Bil+Sweden&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook">
          <span style="display:none;">
          </span>
         </span>
         <i>
          Download file "Nyregistreringar december 2014 (prel)" see tables: "Nyregistrerade supermiljöbilar december 2014" with summary of plug-in passenger car registrations by model for 2013 (revised) and 2014, and table "Nyregistrerade eldrivna lätta lastbilar (högst 3,5 ton) per modell:" for plug-in utility vans registrations for the same two years. A total of 303,866 new passenger vehicles were registered in 2014, and a total of 4,656 super clean cars, resulting in a PEV market share of 1.53% of new car sales.
         </i>

         <span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3APlug-in+hybrid&amp;rft.atitle=PHEVs+-+Take+off+or+transitory+blip%3F&amp;rft.au=Automotive+Industry+Data+%28AID%29&amp;rft.date=2016-02-15&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.eagleaid.com%2FAID-Newsletter-preorder-1603preview-c-PHEVs-Take-off-or-transitory-blip.htm&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal">
          <span style="display:none;">
          </span>
         </span>
         <i>
          The Mitsubishi’s Outlander PHEV was the top-seller in Western Europe with 31,270 units sold.
         </i>
        </span>
       </li>
       <li id="cite_note-Top10_2014-385">
        <span class="mw-cite-backlink">
         ^
         <a href="#cite_ref-Top10_2014_385-0">
          <sup>
           <i>
            <b>
             a
            </b>
           </i>
          </sup>
         </a>
         <a href="#cite_ref-Top10_2014_385-1">
          <sup>
           <i>
            <b>
             b
            </b>
           </i>
          </sup>
         </a>
        </span>
        <span class="reference-text">
         <cite class="citation web">
          Jeff Cobb (2015-02-11).
          <a class="external text" href="http://www.hybridcars.com/2014s-top-10-global-best-selling-plug-in-cars/9/" rel="nofollow">
           "2014's Top-10 Global Best-Selling Plug-in Cars - 3. Mitsubishi Outlander PHEV – 31,136"
          </a>
          . HybridCars.com
          <span class="reference-accessdate">
           . Retrieved
           <span class="nowrap">
            2015-02-17
           </span>
          </span>
          .
         </cite>
         <span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3APlug-in+hybrid&amp;rft.au=Jeff+Cobb&amp;rft.btitle=2014%27s+Top-10+Global+Best-Selling+Plug-in+Cars+-+3.+Mitsubishi+Outlander+PHEV+%93+31%2C136&amp;rft.date=2015-02-11&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.hybridcars.com%2F2014s-top-10-global-best-selling-plug-in-cars%2F9%2F&amp;rft.pub=HybridCars.com&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook">
          <span style="display:none;">
          </span>
         </span>
         <i>
          With 31,136 units sold in 2014, the Outlander P-HEV ranked third among the top selling plug-in electric cars in 2014, after the Tesla Model S (31,655) and the Nissan Leaf (61,507). Accounting for global cumulative sales through the end of 2014, the Outlander ranks fifth with almost 49,000 units sold.
         </i>
        </span>
       </li>

         <span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3APlug-in+hybrid&amp;rft.atitle=2017+Mitsubishi+Outlander+Plug-In+Hybrid%3A+On+Sale+Late+Summer%2C+Now&amp;rft.au=Stephen+Edelstein&amp;rft.date=2015-12-29&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.greencarreports.com%2Fnews%2F1101608_2017-mitsubishi-outlander-plug-in-hybrid-on-sale-late-summer-now&amp;rft.jtitle=Green+Car+Reports&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal">
          <span style="display:none;">

       <li id="cite_note-Top10EU102015-395">
        <span class="mw-cite-backlink">
         <b>
          <a href="#cite_ref-Top10EU102015_395-0">
           ^
          </a>
         </b>
        </span>
        <span class="reference-text">
         <cite class="citation web">
          Jeff Cobb (2015-10-01).
          <a class="external text" href="http://www.hybridcars.com/why-europe-has-passed-the-us-as-number-one-in-plug-in-electrified-vehicles/" rel="nofollow">
           "Why Europe Has Passed the US As Number One In Plug-in Electrified Vehicles"
          </a>
          .
          <i>
           HybridCars.com
          </i>
          <span class="reference-accessdate">
           . Retrieved
           <span class="nowrap">
            2015-12-01
           </span>
          </span>
          .
         </cite>
         <span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3APlug-in+hybrid&amp;rft.atitle=Why+Europe+Has+Passed+the+US+As+Number+One+In+Plug-in+Electrified+Vehicles&amp;rft.au=Jeff+Cobb&amp;rft.date=2015-10-01&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.hybridcars.com%2Fwhy-europe-has-passed-the-us-as-number-one-in-plug-in-electrified-vehicles%2F&amp;rft.jtitle=HybridCars.com&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal">
          <span style="display:none;">
          </span>
         </span>
         <i>
          The top selling plug-in cars in Europe during the first ten months of 2015 were the Mitsubishi Outlander P-HEV (22,061), the Nissan Leaf (13,801), and the Renault Zoe (13,561). As of October 2015
          <sup class="plainlinks noprint asof-tag update" style="display:none;">
           <a class="external text" href="//en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Plug-in_hybrid&amp;action=edit">
            [update]
           </a>
          </sup>
          , the Outlander P-HEV ranks as the all-time best selling PEV in Europe with over 50,000 units sold.
         </i>
        </span>
       </li>
       <li id="cite_note-Nether032016-396">
        <span class="mw-cite-backlink">
         ^
         <a href="#cite_ref-Nether032016_396-0">
          <sup>
           <i>
            <b>
             a
            </b>
           </i>
          </sup>
         </a>
         <a href="#cite_ref-Nether032016_396-1">
          <sup>
           <i>
            <b>
             b
            </b>
           </i>
          </sup>
         </a>
        </span>
        <span class="reference-text">
         <cite class="citation web">
          <a class="external text" href="https://www.bovag.nl/BovagWebsite/media/BovagMediaFiles/Cijfers/2016/Cijfers-elektrisch-vervoer-tm-maart-2016.pdf" rel="nofollow">
           "Cijfers elektrisch vervoer – Top 5 geregistreerde modellen plug-in hybride elektrische voertuigen" [Figures electric transport – Top 5 registered plug-in hybrid electric vehicle models]
          </a>
          <span style="font-size:85%;">
           (PDF)
          </span>
          (in Dutch). Rijksdienst voor Ondernemend Nederland. April 2016
          <span class="reference-accessdate">
           . Retrieved
           <span class="nowrap">
            2016-05-09
           </span>
          </span>
          .
         </cite>
         <span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3APlug-in+hybrid&amp;rft.btitle=Cijfers+elektrisch+vervoer+%93+Top+5+geregistreerde+modellen+plug-in+hybride+elektrische+voertuigen&amp;rft.date=2016-04&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bovag.nl%2FBovagWebsite%2Fmedia%2FBovagMediaFiles%2FCijfers%2F2016%2FCijfers-elektrisch-vervoer-tm-maart-2016.pdf&amp;rft.pub=Rijksdienst+voor+Ondernemend+Nederland&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook">
          <span style="display:none;">
          </span>
         </span>
         <i>
          With a total of 24,572 Mitsubishi Outlander P-HEVs registered by the end of March 2016, the plug-in hybrid is the all-time top registered plug-in electric vehicle in the Netherlands.
         </i>
        </span>
       </li>

        <span class="mw-cite-backlink">
         <b>
          <a href="#cite_ref-ChinaTop2015EV_427-0">
           ^
          </a>
         </b>
        </span>
        <span class="reference-text">
         <cite class="citation web">
          Staff (2016-01-14).
          <a class="external text" href="http://chinaautoweb.com/2016/01/sales-ranking-of-china-made-pure-electric-cars-in-2015/" rel="nofollow">
           "Sales Ranking of China-made Pure-electric Cars in 2015"
          </a>
          .
          <i>
           China Auto Web
          </i>
          <span class="reference-accessdate">
           . Retrieved
           <span class="nowrap">
            2016-02-10
           </span>
          </span>
          .
         </cite>
         <span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3APlug-in+hybrid&amp;rft.atitle=Sales+Ranking+of+China-made+Pure-electric+Cars+in+2015&amp;rft.au=Staff&amp;rft.date=2016-01-14&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fchinaautoweb.com%2F2016%2F01%2Fsales-ranking-of-china-made-pure-electric-cars-in-2015%2F&amp;rft.jtitle=China+Auto+Web&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal">
          <span style="display:none;">
          </span>
         </span>
         <i>
          A total of 16,736 Kandi EVs, 16,488 BAIC E-Series EVs, and 15,467 Zotye Z100 EVs were sold in China in 2015.
         </i>
        </span>
       </li>

         <b>
          <a href="#cite_ref-Nether2012_2014_475-0">
           ^
          </a>
         </b>

        <span class="reference-text">
         <cite class="citation web">
          Rijksdienst voor Ondernemend Nederland (RVO) (January 2015).
          <a class="external text" href="http://www.vna-lease.nl/stream/2014-cijfers-elektrisch-vervoer-tm-december-2014.pdf" rel="nofollow">

          </a>

          .
         </cite>
         <span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3APlug-in+hybrid&amp;rft.au=Rijksdienst+voor+Ondernemend+Nederland+%28RVO%29&amp;rft.btitle=Cijfers+elektrisch+vervoer+-+Aantal+geregistreerde+elektrische+voertuigen+in+Nederland+-+Top+5+geregistreerde+modellen+plug-in+hybride+elektrische+voertuigen+%2831-12-2014%29+-+Top+6+geregistreerde+modellen+volledig+elektrische+voertuigen+%2831-12-2014%29&amp;rft.date=2015-01&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.vna-lease.nl%2Fstream%2F2014-cijfers-elektrisch-vervoer-tm-december-2014.pdf&amp;rft.pub=RVO+%28Dutch+National+Office+for+Enterprising%29&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook">
          <span style="display:none;">
          </span>
         </span>
         <i>
          Click the url to download the file "2014-cijfers-elektrisch-vervoer-tm-december-2014.pdf.pdf" See under the heading "31-12-2014" for total registrations figures at the end of December 2014. A total of 2,645 Model S sedans were registered in the Netherlands as of December 2014
          <sup class="plainlinks noprint asof-tag update" style="display:none;">
           <a class="external text" href="//en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Plug-in_hybrid&amp;action=edit">
            [update]
           </a>
          </sup>
          , and it ranks as the top registered all-electric vehicles in the country.
         </i>
        </span>
       </li>

         <span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3APlug-in+hybrid&amp;rft.au=Mat+Gasnier&amp;rft.btitle=Netherlands+December+2013%3A+Mitsubishi+Outlander+at+12.7%25+share%2C+Volvo+V40+and+V60+on+podium&amp;rft.date=2014-01-03&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fbestsellingcarsblog.com%2F2013%2F12%2F04%2Fnetherlands-november-2013-mitsubishi-outlander-shoots-up-to-pole-position%2F&amp;rft.pub=Best+Selling+Cars+Blog&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook">

       <li id="cite_note-UK4Q2015-491">
        <span class="mw-cite-backlink">
         ^
         <a href="#cite_ref-UK4Q2015_491-0">
          <sup>
           <i>
            <b>
             a
            </b>
           </i>
          </sup>
         </a>
         <a href="#cite_ref-UK4Q2015_491-1">
          <sup>
           <i>
            <b>
             b
            </b>
           </i>
          </sup>
         </a>
         <a href="#cite_ref-UK4Q2015_491-2">
          <sup>
           <i>
            <b>
             c
            </b>
           </i>
          </sup>
         </a>
        </span>
        <span class="reference-text">
         <cite class="citation web">
          RAC Foundation.
          <a class="external text" href="http://www.racfoundation.org/data/plug-in-grant-eligible-vehicles-licensed-by-quarter" rel="nofollow">
           "Plug-in grant eligible vehicles licensed"
          </a>
          . UK:
          <a href="/wiki/RAC_Foundation" title="RAC Foundation">
           RAC Foundation
          </a>
          <span class="reference-accessdate">
           . Retrieved
           <span class="nowrap">
            2016-04-15
           </span>
          </span>
          .
         </cite>
         <span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3APlug-in+hybrid&amp;rft.au=RAC+Foundation&amp;rft.btitle=Plug-in+grant+eligible+vehicles+licensed&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.racfoundation.org%2Fdata%2Fplug-in-grant-eligible-vehicles-licensed-by-quarter&amp;rft.place=UK&amp;rft.pub=RAC+Foundation&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook">
          <span style="display:none;">
          </span>
         </span>
         <i>
          Figures correspond to the number of vehicles registered at the end of the corresponding quarter. A total of 1,580 Prius PHEV and 1,359 VW Golf GTEs were registered in the UK at the end of December 2015. A total of 1,279 Amperas were registered in the UK at the end of September 2015, and the number of Amperas registered was lower by the end of 2015. A total of 125 Volts were registered at the end of June 2015, and the number of registered Volts decreased thereafter.
         </i>
        </span>
       </li>

         </b>

          </i>

           <span class="nowrap">

         <span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3APlug-in+hybrid&amp;rft.atitle=Five+Ways+Toyota+Updated+Its+2017+Prius+%98Prime%99+Plug-in+Hybrid&amp;rft.aufirst=Jeff&amp;rft.aulast=Cobb&amp;rft.date=2016-03-28&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.hybridcars.com%2Ffive-ways-toyota-updated-its-2017-prius-prime-plug-in-hybrid%2F&amp;rft.jtitle=HybridCars.com&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal">
          <span style="display:none;">

         <i>
          As of December 2015
          <sup class="plainlinks noprint asof-tag update" style="display:none;">
           <a class="external text" href="//en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Plug-in_hybrid&amp;action=edit">
            [update]
           </a>
          </sup>
          , the world's top selling plug-in electric cars are the Nissan Leaf (about 202,000), Tesla Model S (about 107,000), Chevrolet Volt and Ampera variants (over 106,000), Mitsubishi Outlander PHEV (about 92,000), and Toyota Prius Plug-in Hybrid (about 75,000). All figures cumulative global sales since launch.

         <span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3APlug-in+hybrid&amp;rft.atitle=Toyota+bent+on+keeping+reputation+as+green+carmaker+in+US&amp;rft.aufirst=Toyoki&amp;rft.aulast=Nakanishi&amp;rft.au=Oshima%2C+Yumiko&amp;rft.date=2016-03-25&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fasia.nikkei.com%2FBusiness%2FCompanies%2FToyota-bent-on-keeping-reputation-as-green-carmaker-in-US&amp;rft.jtitle=The+Nikkei&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal">
          <span style="display:none;">
          </span>
         </span>
         <i>
          Prius PHV cumulative global sales since 2012 have been about 75,000 units. The North American market accounts for 60% of all unit sales.
         </i>

         <i>
          Global Prius Plug-in sales totaled 27,279 in 2012, 21,381 in 2013, 19,878 in 2014 and 5,051 units during the first seven months of 2015. Sales in Japan totaled 21,657 units through July 2015.

       </td>
       <td class="mbox-text plainlist">
        Wikimedia Commons has media related to
        <i>
         <b>
          <a class="extiw" href="https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:Plug-in_electric_hybrid-powered_vehicles" title="commons:Category:Plug-in electric hybrid-powered vehicles">
           Plug-in electric hybrid-powered vehicles
          </a>
         </b>
        </i>

       </a>
       ,
       <a class="external text" href="http://www.epa.gov/dfe/pubs/projects/lbnp/final-li-ion-battery-lca-report.pdf" rel="nofollow">
        Application of Life-Cycle Assessment to Nanoscale Technology: Lithium-ion Batteries for Electric Vehicles
       </a>
       , April 2013.
      </li>
     </ul>
